title: Steelers-Bengals aftermath, fallout from Giants' firings & 'hot butt' coaches
itunes:title: Steelers-Bengals aftermath, fallout from Giants' firings & 'hot butt' coaches
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal & Colleen Wolfe- recap Monday Night's showdown between the Steelers and Bengals (3:00); The physicality of the game, which resulted in serious injuries for Ryan Shazier and Vontaze Burfict (5:00); Reaction to the Giants firing Ben McAdoo and Jerry Reese (16:00); A shameful moment for the Throne of Ease, courtesy of Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski (24:00); Which coaches have "hot butts" regarding their job security? (29:00); And much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
